## PortalProps type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PortalProps<TBaseElement> = {
    getDefaultTarget?: () => TBaseElement | null;
    instrument?: (impl: PortalFactory<TBaseElement>['impl'], instrumentation: InstrumentationContext, context: ServiceContext) => PortalFactory<TBaseElement>['impl'];
};
```
